content: a playful tasseled hat crocheted in a beautiful rich color is sure to brighten even the grayest day this winter it s quick too double_crochet a large hook and a lovely wool all combine to create a delicious fabric that proves something doesn t need to be difficult to make a statement if you re not familiar with making tassels pompoms may be substituted at the ends tassels are much less work than pompoms though give it a shot
